name: Hatebreed
description: '''Hatebreed''' is an American [[metalcore]]/[[Hardcore punk|hardcore]] band from [[Bridgeport, Connecticut]], formed in 1994. The band released its debut album ''[[Satisfaction Is the Death of Desire]]'' in 1997, which gave the band a [[cult following]]. The band signed to [[Universal Records]] and released ''[[Perseverance (Hatebreed album)|Perseverance]]'' in 2002, which hit the [[Billboard 200|''Billboard'' 200]]. The band is described to combine elements of [[Hardcore punk|hardcore]] and [[Heavy metal music|heavy metal]]. They have played a major role in the Connecticut hardcore scene.
